Uses of Class
nzilbb.ag.util.SpanningConventionTransformer

  • Packages that use SpanningConventionTransformer 
    Package Description
    nzilbb.ag.util
    Utility classes for processing annotation graphs.

    • Uses of SpanningConventionTransformer in nzilbb.ag.util

      Methods in nzilbb.ag.util that return SpanningConventionTransformer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setAnnotatePrevious​(boolean newAnnotatePrevious)
      Setter for annotatePrevious: Whether the destination annotation annotates the source token prior to the first matching source token (i.e. whether they should share start anchors).
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setCloseGaps​(boolean newCloseGaps)
      Setter for closeGaps: Whether to close gaps in the source layer created by deleting span annotations, by setting the end of the previous annotation to the start of the following annotation.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setDeleteInSource​(boolean newDeleteInSource)
      Setter for deleteInSource: Whether to delete the source annotations between the start and end source annotations (exclusive).
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setDelimiter​(String newDelimiter)
      Setter for delimiter: Delimiter to insert between source labels when concatenting them to for the destination label.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setDestinationEndResult​(String newDestinationEndResult)
      Setter for destinationEndResult: The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to not include the end annotation.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setDestinationLayerId​(String newDestinationLayerId)
      Setter for destinationLayerId: Layer ID of the annotation created for each span.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setDestinationStartResult​(String newDestinationStartResult)
      Setter for destinationStartResult: The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to not include the start annotation.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setEndPattern​(String newEndPattern)
      Setter for endPattern: A regular expression matching the label of the last source annotation in the span.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setSourceEndResult​(String newSourceEndResult)
      Setter for sourceEndResult: The resulting label of the end source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to delete the end annotation.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setSourceLayerId​(String newSourceLayerId)
      Setter for sourceLayerId: Layer ID of the annotations to transform.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setSourceStartResult​(String newSourceStartResult)
      Setter for sourceStartResult: The resulting label of the start source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to delete the start annotation.
      SpanningConventionTransformer SpanningConventionTransformer.setStartPattern​(String newStartPattern)
      Setter for startPattern: A regular expression matching the label of the first source annotation in the span.
